snippet: The Labor Department said that its Consumer Price Index increased 0.2 percent last month in broad-based price gains after a similar increase in February
abstract: Labor Dept says Consumer Price Index rose 0.2 percent in March, following similar increase in February, largely due to rising gas and housing costs.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said that its Consumer Price Index increased 0.2 percent last month in broad-based price gains after a similar increase in February

headline.main: U.S. Consumer Prices Increase Again, Spurred by Rising Gas Costs
headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumer Prices Rise, Spurred by Gas and Housing
